customProperties.armorEffects: You take 2 reduced damage from all sources of damage, doubled against critical hits against you.
customProperties.weaponEffects: Weapons deal an additional 2 Damage, doubled against structures or when you land a critical hit.
customProperties.additionalEffects: Structures made from Palladium have resistance to all damage.

entries.name: Properties
entries: Armor Effects: You take 2 reduced damage from all sources of damage, doubled against critical hits against you.
Weapon Effects: Weapons deal an additional 2 Damage, doubled against structures or when you land a critical hit.
Additional Effects: Structures made from Palladium have resistance to all damage.
